Package org.resthub.identity.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GroupService
    Group services interface.
    RoleService  
    SearchService
    Special service that performs search queries on users, groups and roles
    UserService
    User services interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTraceableServiceImpl<TEntity,TDao extends GenericDao<TEntity,Long>>
    Base class to put common stuff for service traceability.
    GroupServiceImpl
    An implementation of a Group Service
    It's based on both GenericResourceServiceImpl and GroupService It's a bean whose name is "groupService"
    RoleServiceImpl  
    SearchServiceImpl
    Search service implementation.
    UserServiceImpl
    An implementation of a UserService dealing with OAuth2 authentication
    It is based on AbstractEncryptedPasswordUserService It is a bean whose name is userService
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GroupService.GroupServiceChange
    Kind of changes notified by this service
    RoleService.RoleChange
    Kind of changes notified for role events
    UserService.UserServiceChange
    Kind of changes notified by this service
